tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Mahara is such a sweet lady. She gives a reasonable amount of work and is very understanding towards your personal well-being. Some people complain about her talking in class, but to me she keeps the positivity running through in class. She is caring and give good feedbacks in crit. Overall, she\'s a really good professor, highly recommended.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Really inspirational and is willing to connect to her students. Yes there are rules you must follow but it\'s only to help you improve. She also is very helpful if you\'re feeling stuck.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Great teacher. She\'s helpful and knows how to give positive constructive critisim. She helps guide students with clear instruction and is also compassionate and willing to work with you. You do have to show you are putting in all your effort and paying attention & learning. She is a well rounded teacher & awesome. I am greatful for the experience.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Mahara is a very wise professor, I love her discussions while we are painting/working in class. She is very truthful about life, finding a job, etc. Her class was very therapeutic and fun. I would definitely take another class if she taught it. I learned how to mix paints there, which helped me improve on painting. I can\'t say enough about her!

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I recommend taking this class only if you can draw. If not, then you will not get an A. Very nice teacher though.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: No way to get a D or F on projects in her class when it comes to finishing projects. If I did that to any painting, drawing, 2d, and/or 3d instructors (for example), sloppy artwork, I would be getting a D or an F. But in her class, if my project looks sloppy, then it is a C. My good attendance ends up averaging to B.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Most drawing, painting, 2d & 3d design instructors would be giving me a D or F if the projects were sloppy and submitted and needs improvement. In Mrs. Sinclaire\'s 2d class, if the projects were sloppy and submitted and needs improvment, then it is a C. This means there is no way students can get a D or F unless they did not do their project.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Prof. Sinclaire is a great artist, but she shouldn\'t be a teacher. She gets jealous of her students, and does not grade works by efforts that were put in, but only by how good they look. If you are a beginner in art, she will treat you very very nice, but if not, avoid her.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: a very positive teacher, GREAT if you are JUST getting into design. However if you are already at a higher level don\'t bother taking the class. she\'s very nice, and she makes the class a very relaxed atmosphere. GREAT work space. very lenient, hardly gets mad. work hard and you\'ll be fine!

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: AWSOME !!!

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: She\'s Extremely nice and friendly, Never ever gets mad, and is really lenient on project due dates. You have to show up for class and come in on time for a small portion of your grade. Projects are fairly easy, just follow the syllabus.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: From the start, she seems a little odd, after awhile you start to understand her.Grades are subjective. Critics are a bit fake...somehow everyone\'s artwork is amazing. Class is very structured, have to follow the rules on projects. Her tardy grades play a big part in your grade. Field trips are fun. Average 2D design class-Love it or hate it.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: mahara makes the experience incredibly well rounded. i learned more in her class than in all my classes put together. she is very clear and you know what you are learning. she is very encouraging and incredibly knowledgeable and helpful. if you try on your projects you can get a good grade but the more work you put in the better the grade

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Fun Proffessor, Intelligent, Helpful, Had a great time in class, Attendence and Showing up on time is a must. Enjoyed her class a lot, knows about art.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: She downgrades art work if it does\'t follow her own rules, So it\'s easy or hard??? Projects themself not hard at all. Very diplomatic & too.. talkative. Everyone will learn things during doing projects anyway,if you\'re looking for a creative & younger instructor,better find differnt one.Be a good boy in her class then you\'ll be safe & good.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: It was easy to get an "A," but keep attending the class and do not be late. Read carefully her syllabus and follow the instruction, then, you will be improved by yourself very well.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: She tries to maintain a good class,but honestly she would be a capable teacher if she teaches in high school.She\'s diplomatic,minds tardiness 4 some reasons.it\'s not recommended for someone really wants to learn art& design.She walks around shows pictorial information,later you realize because she doesn\'t know how to make & teach contemporary arts.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: she\'s a really nice person, learned a lot in this class. extremely strict tardy policy. other than that, no problems with this class. 6 projects in winter session. all very straight forward. if you put in effort, easy class.

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: She\'s a fun teacher. Very nice and very clear. She\'ll help you and encourage you. If you have to take this class take it with her, you\'ll have fun and the assignments are kewl and easy!

tag_professor: Inspirational (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: She is very organized, clear and responsible with all the handouts and instructions. Very helpful when you need help. One thing is that she is very diplomatic about your artwork. Some people find it encouraging, but some do not like it.
